DOC.HEADLINE: WEST VENTURA COUNTY FOCUS : CAMARILLO ; FUNDS HELP EXPAND LIBRARIES ' HOURS
DOC.TEXT: The Ventura County Library Services_Agency has received more_than $ 10 # 000 in donations that it will use to expand the operating hours of county libraries in Camarillo and Ventura . The Library Services_Agency on Tuesday accepted $ 3 # 000 from the Camarillo Newcomers Club and other community fund-raising groups . The money will allow the Camarillo Library to open two additional hours each Wednesday between Jan . 4 and Aug . 30 , said Dixie Adeniran , the county ' s library director . During this time , the library will open from 10 a.m. to 8 p.m. Wednesdays . The Library Services_Agency also accepted $ 7 # 667 raised through public fund-raising events in Ventura . The money will go toward adding two hours of service each Saturday at the E.P. Foster Library ; two hours each Wednesday at the H.P. Wright Library , and one more hour each Monday at the Avenue Library between January and June , Adeniran said . All three libraries are in Ventura . CARLOS V . LOZANO
